select a.*,b.CallNo,c.OldManName,c.IDNo,c.Address,c.Gender,c.Birthday from (select * from Pub_Reminder where Id in( select MAX(Id) from Pub_Reminder group by SourceKey )) a left join Oca_OldManConfigInfo b on a.SourceKey=b.OldManId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo c on b.OldManId = c.OldManId
a.OldManId=#OldManId# c.Status=#OldManStatus# c.AreaId=#AreaId# a.RemindTime>=to_date(#RemindTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.RemindTime<=to_date(#RemindTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select top 1 b.*,a.CallNo,a.OldManId from Oca_OldManConfigInfo a left join (select * From Pub_Reminder WHERE SourceTable='Oca_OldManConfigInfo' and SourceColumn='OldManId' SourceType=#SourceType# RemindTime>=#RemindTime# ) b on a.OldManId=b.SourceKey
a.CallNo=#CallNo#
$OrderByClause$

select b.SourceType, count(SourceKey) as ReminderNum from Pub_ReminderObject a inner join Pub_reminder b on a.ReminderId=b.Id where a.ResponseFlag=0 and a.ObjectType=#ObjectType# and ObjectKey=#ObjectKey#
and b.SourceTable=#SourceTable#
and b.SourceColumn=#SourceColumn#
and Datediff(d,b.RemindTime,getdate()) = 0 Group by b.SourceType order by b.SourceType

select a.ReminderId,b.SourceType,b.SourceKey,b.RemindContent from Pub_ReminderObject a inner join Pub_reminder b on a.ReminderId=b.Id where a.ResponseFlag=0 and a.ObjectType=#ObjectType# and ObjectKey=#ObjectKey#
and b.SourceTable=#SourceTable#
and b.SourceColumn=#SourceColumn#
and Datediff(d,b.RemindTime,getdate()) = 0 order by b.CheckInTime
statements.update: update Pub_ReminderObject set ResponseFlag=1,ResponseAppType=#ResponseAppType# Where ResponseFlag=0 And ObjectType=#ObjectType# And ObjectKey=#ObjectKey# And ReminderId in ( select Id from Pub_Reminder Where SourceType=#SourceType# and Datediff(d,RemindTime,getdate()) = 0 SourceTable=#SourceTable# SourceColumn=#SourceColumn# SourceKey=#SourceKey# )
